field.name: icon_font_name
field.label: icon_font_name
field.description: File name for all font files.

field.name: icon_font_svg_id
field.label: icon_font_svg_id
field.description: Element ID within SVG icon file.

field.name: component_active_color
field.label: component_active_color
field.description: Global color for active items (e.g., navs or dropdowns).

field.name: component_active_bg
field.label: component_active_bg
field.description: Global background color for active items (e.g., navs or dropdowns).

field.name: caret_width_base
field.label: caret_width_base
field.description: Width of the border for generating carets that indicator dropdowns.

field.name: caret_width_large
field.label: caret_width_large
field.description: Carets increase slightly in size for larger components.

field.name: table_bg
field.label: table_bg
field.description: Default background color used for all tables.

field.name: table_border_color
field.label: table_border_color
field.description: Border color for table and cell borders.

field.name: input_border_focus
field.label: input_border_focus
field.description: Border color for inputs on focus

field.name: input_group_addon_bg
field.label: input_group_addon_bg
field.description: Background color for textual input addons

field.name: input_group_addon_border_color
field.label: input_group_addon_border_color
field.description: Border color for textual input addons

field.name: cursor_disabled
field.label: cursor_disabled
field.description: Disabled cursor for form controls and buttons

field.name: dropdown_divider_bg
field.label: dropdown_divider_bg
field.description: Divider color for between dropdown items.

field.name: dropdown_link_active_color
field.label: dropdown_link_active_color
field.description: Active dropdown menu item text color.

field.name: dropdown_link_active_bg
field.label: dropdown_link_active_bg
field.description: Active dropdown menu item background color

field.name: dropdown_link_disabled_color
field.label: dropdown_link_disabled_color
field.description: Disabled dropdown menu item background color.

field.name: dropdown_header_color
field.label: dropdown_header_color
field.description: Text color for headers within dropdown menus.

field.name: grid_columns
field.label: grid_columns
field.description: Number of columns in the grid.

field.name: grid_gutter_width
field.label: grid_gutter_width
field.description: Padding between columns. Gets divided in half for the left and right.

field.name: grid_float_breakpoint
field.label: grid_float_breakpoint
field.description: Point at which the navbar becomes uncollapsed.

field.name: grid_float_breakpoint_max
field.label: grid_float_breakpoint_max
field.description: Point at which the navbar begins collapsing.

field.name: label_link_hover_color
field.label: label_link_hover_color
field.description: Default text color of a linked label

field.name: modal_inner_padding
field.label: modal_inner_padding
field.description: Padding applied to the modal body

field.name: modal_title_padding
field.label: modal_title_padding
field.description: Padding applied to the modal title

field.name: modal_content_bg
field.label: modal_content_bg
field.description: Background color of modal content area

field.name: modal_content_fallback_border_color
field.label: modal_content_fallback_border_color
field.description: Modal content border color for IE8

field.name: progress_bg
field.label: progress_bg
field.description: Background color of the whole progress component

field.name: progress_border_radius
field.label: progress_border_radius
field.description: Variable for setting rounded corners on progress bar.

field.name: list_group_hover_bg
field.label: list_group_hover_bg
field.description: Background color of single list items on hover

field.name: list_group_active_color
field.label: list_group_active_color
field.description: Text color of active list items

field.name: list_group_active_bg
field.label: list_group_active_bg
field.description: Background color of active list items

field.name: list_group_active_border
field.label: list_group_active_border
field.description: Border color of active list elements

field.name: list_group_active_text_color
field.label: list_group_active_text_color
field.description: Text color for content within active list items

field.name: list_group_disabled_color
field.label: list_group_disabled_color
field.description: Text color of disabled list items

field.name: list_group_disabled_bg
field.label: list_group_disabled_bg
field.description: Background color of disabled list items

field.name: list_group_disabled_text_color
field.label: list_group_disabled_text_color
field.description: Text color for content within disabled list items

field.name: panel_inner_border
field.label: panel_inner_border
field.description: Border color for elements within panels

field.name: thumbnail_caption_color
field.label: thumbnail_caption_color
field.description: Custom text color for thumbnail captions

field.name: badge_active_color
field.label: badge_active_color
field.description: Badge text color in active nav link

field.name: badge_active_bg
field.label: badge_active_bg
field.description: Badge background color in active nav link

field.name: breadcrumb_active_color
field.label: breadcrumb_active_color
field.description: Text color of current page in the breadcrumb

field.name: breadcrumb_separator
field.label: breadcrumb_separator
field.description: Textual separator for between breadcrumb elements

field.name: component_offset_horizontal
field.label: component_offset_horizontal
field.description: Horizontal offset for forms and lists

field.name: dl_horizontal_offset
field.label: dl_horizontal_offset
field.description: Width of horizontal description list titles
